banner_item_copy.jcr:description: An instant way to fund your larger expenses

banner_item_copy_cop.jcr:description: An instant way to fund your larger expenses

banner_item_copy_cop_1157299181.jcr:description: An instant way to fund your larger expenses

about_product_text_c.text: Have you taken a personal loan but are suddenly facing a financial emergency? Are you looking for instant cash to fund these unexpected needs? Tata Capital has got your back. Our Personal Overdraft Loan facility allows you to withdraw additional funds as and when you need them. What's more? You only have to pay interest on the amount you actually use. We understand certain emergencies can come unannounced. This is why our personal overdraft loan is flexible and offers multiple withdrawals and part-payment facilities at zero extra charges.

lastTextWithA.description:
13.50% p.a

View Rates & Charges

instant-personal-slider.className: instant-personal-slider multipurpose-slider flex-slider slider-arrows jsCanTakeSlider slick-slider

key_features_card.jcr:description: Struggling to arrange the down payment for the property you want to buy? With a Personal Loan online from Tata Capital, book your dream house without any difficulty. Get the required funds within minutes of approval and at competitive rates.
key_features_card.jcr:title: Make a Down Payment

key_features_card_co_1482979723.jcr:description: Is keeping track of multiple personal loan instalments becoming a challenge? Manage your finances better by consolidating your existing personal loans into one and clear dues comfortably. Avail of a quick and easy Personal Loan from Tata Capital and reduce your EMI burden considerably.
key_features_card_co_1482979723.jcr:title: Debt consolidation

key_features_card_757314299.jcr:description: Is keeping track of multiple personal loan instalments becoming a challenge? Manage your finances better by consolidating your existing personal loans into one and clear dues comfortably. Avail of a quick and easy Personal Loan from Tata Capital and reduce your EMI burden considerably.
key_features_card_757314299.jcr:title: Debt consolidation

key_features_card.jcr:description: The documentation and paper work for personal overdraft loan is minimal which keeps you hassle free.
key_features_card.jcr:title: Simple Documentation

key_features_card_co.jcr:description: Pay interest only on utilized amount. Part-payment facility available for personal overdraft loan without any extra charge.
key_features_card_co.jcr:title: Easy Repayment Options

key_features_card_co_2138258761.jcr:description: Withdraw and pay back multiple times within the credit sanctioned/available limit with overdraft personal loan.
key_features_card_co_2138258761.jcr:title: Multiple Withdrawals

key_features_card_co_1725268795.jcr:description: With Tata Capital's Personal Loan with OD Facility, Limit stays fixed for 1 year for 48, 60 & 72 months tenure. Limit stays fixed for 2 years for 84 months tenure. Drop in limit to start post 12 Months. Limit stays fixed for 2 years for 60 Months Tenure product. Drop in limit start post 24 Months when you avail of a personal loan with OD facility.
key_features_card_co_1725268795.jcr:title: Fixed Limit

description.text: You can apply for a Personal Loan Balance Transfer by fulfilling the conditions below:

check_loan_eligibili_1077804246.text: In fixed hybrid, the limit would remain fixed for a certain tenure and then convert to dropline for the rest of the tenure

check_loan_eligibili_374561183.text: For 48, 60 & 72 months tenure, PL CCOD product, limit will remain fixed for first year and dropdown starts after completion of one year

check_loan_eligibili.text: For 84 months tenure, PL CCOD product, limit will remain fixed for first two years and dropdown starts after completion of two years

only-heading.boldTerm: Tata Capital offers Fixed Hybrid Personal Loan Overdraft facility

item_1671182759452.cq:panelTitle: What is Personal Loan Overdraft Facility?

text.text: Personal loan can be availed by those who meet the following eligibility criteria:

popular_faq_descript_200750825.jcr:title: Monthly Incomeâ€“must be at least Rs. 15,000 per month.

popular_faq_descript_1717367127.jcr:title: Job Stabilityâ€“The applicant must be in the same job for the past six months.

popular_faq_descript_1283418988.jcr:title: Work Experienceâ€“The applicant must have a minimum of one year of work experience.

item_1671182794032.cq:panelTitle: Types of Personal Loan OD Facility

text.text: The documents needed to avail of a personal loan depend on the purpose of your loan. For example,

item_1671182842904.cq:panelTitle: When will the customer receive login ID and password for online portal?

text.text: The following are documents required for personal loan eligibility by self-employed individuals â€“

popular_faq_descript.jcr:title: Proof of Existence of Businessâ€“Tax Registration copy/Company Registration License/Shop Establishment Proof

popular_faq_descript_2140895260.jcr:title: Identity Proof documentsâ€“Passport/Voterâ€™s ID/PAN Card/Driving Licens

popular_faq_descript_238767962.jcr:title: Residence Proof documentsâ€“Passport/Aadhar Card/Utility Bill/Ration Card

popular_faq_descript_1398810579.jcr:title: Bank Account Statementsâ€“Savings and Current account statements for the past one year

popular_faq_descript_48870029.jcr:title: Income Tax Returns filed for the preceding year

item_1671182856999.cq:panelTitle: What is the eligibility criteria for availing the personal overdraft facility?

text.text: A self-employed person can get a personal loan with Tata Capital by meeting the following eligibility criteria â€“

popular_faq_descript.jcr:title: The applicantâ€™s age must be between 22 to 58 years

popular_faq_descript_1530875188.jcr:title: The applicant must have a monthly income of at least Rs.15,000

popular_faq_descript_211221741.jcr:title: The applicant must have at least one year of work experience

item_1671182872895.cq:panelTitle: How will the amount be disbursed?

text_copy.text: The minimum salary requirement for availing of a personal loan with Tata Capital is Rs. 15,000.

item_1671182885681.cq:panelTitle: Does the customer have to pay PF, Insurance and Stamp Duty after deduction in cases where customer has requested for entire amount to be disbursed?

text_copy.text: The following are the basic personal loan documents you need for availing of a loan:

popular_faq_descript.jcr:title: Photo Identity Proofâ€“Copy of your Voterâ€™s ID/Passport/Driving License/Aadhar Card

popular_faq_descript_1706122490.jcr:title: Income Proofâ€“Copy of past six monthsâ€™ bank statements

popular_faq_descript_505670141.jcr:title: Address Proofâ€“Copy of your Ration Card/Electricity Bill/Passport

popular_faq_descript_608524888.jcr:title: Salary Slipsâ€“Copy of your past three monthsâ€™ salary slips

popular_faq_descript_787458372.jcr:title: Employment Certificateâ€“stating one year of continuous employment

text.text: Here is the education loan documents list you need to produce:

popular_faq_descript.jcr:title: Photo Identity Proofâ€“Copy of your Voterâ€™s ID/Passport/Driving License/Aadhar Card

popular_faq_descript_75967621.jcr:title: Attested copies of Marks Sheets & Certificates (from 10th standard)

popular_faq_descript_353253628.jcr:title: Admission letter issued by the admitting School / College / Institute

popular_faq_descript_2077397427.jcr:title: Last three months' salary slips & ITR of Parent/Guarantor

popular_faq_descript_50884970.jcr:title: Education loan documents for studying abroad

popular_faq_descript_1502844890.jcr:title: Other supporting documents required for student loan

popular_faq_descript_232017893.jcr:title: Student loan documents regarding employment details (if employed)

item_1671445155167.cq:panelTitle: When does NACH hit the customerâ€™s registered bank account?

text_copy.text: Here is the education loan documents list you need to produce:

popular_faq_descript.jcr:title: Photo ID proof of student and parents (Voter ID / Passport / Driving license / Aadhaar Card)

popular_faq_descript_1518592388.jcr:title: Last three months' salary slips & ITR of Parent/Guarantor

popular_faq_descript_1332271815.jcr:title: Education loan documents for studying abroad

popular_faq_descript_1933293426.jcr:title: Other supporting documents required for student loan

popular_faq_descript_2138034630.jcr:title: Student loan documents regarding employment details (if employed)
